xwikidoc.content:
### Macro "watchlist" rendering.macro.watchlist.name=Lista za promatranje rendering.macro.watchlist.description=Prikaži sadržaj trenutne liste za promatranje.
### XWiki.WatchListClass XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_realtime=U stvarnom vremenu XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListHourlyNotifier=Svaki sat XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListDailyNotifier=Svaki dan XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListWeeklyNotifier=Svaki tjedan
### Notification Icons watchlist.notifications.icons.on=DA ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.off=OFF watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.page=Promatraj ovu stranicu watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.pageAndChildren=Promatraj ovu stranicu i djecu watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.space=Promatraj roditelja i njegovu djecu watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.wiki=Promatraj ovaj wiki watchlist.notifications.changeStatusError=Promjena statusa liste za promatranje nije uspjela. watchlist.settings=Postavke
### Watchlist livetable (in the macro) watchlist.table.scope.wiki=Sve stranice wikija watchlist.table.scope.pageandchildren=Stranica + djeca watchlist.table.scope.pageonly=Samo stranica watchlist.table.location=Lokacija watchlist.table.scope=Doseg
